snippet: The Italian winemaker Case Basse di Soldera says intruders entered its wine cellar and drained large vats of wine dating from the 2007 vintage through 2012.
abstract: The Italian winemaker Case Basse di Soldera says intruders entered its wine cellar and drained large vats of wine dating from the 2007 vintage through 2012.

headline.main: Vandals Destroy Prized Brunello di Montalcino Wine
